questions.question:
$$ f(x,y) = \frac{dy}{dx} = x + y $$ Solution of equation is as:
(x=0, y=1), (x=0.1, y=1.1103), (x=0.2, y=1.2428), (x=0.3, y=1.3997)
Find y(0.4)?

$$ f(x,y) = \frac{dy}{dx} = -0.2(y - 20) $$ Solution of equation is as:
(x=0, y=90), (x=1, y=77.27), (x=2, y=66.96), (x=3, y=58.45)
Find y(4)?
